sections.title: State Overview
paragraphs:
Minas Gerais is located in the Southeast region of Brazil with its capital in Belo Horizonte.
With a population of 21,300,000, Minas Gerais offers a unique blend of
opportunities and lifestyle experiences. The state is characterized by its Mining, Manufacturing, Agriculture, Technology
and is known for being Very welcoming, historic charm.

paragraphs:
Minas Gerais's economy is built on Mining, Manufacturing, Agriculture, Technology. The state offers significant opportunities
for both local and international professionals seeking employment and business ventures.

sections.title: Education & Universities
paragraphs:
Minas Gerais boasts several excellent universities and educational institutions, making it ideal for
students and families seeking quality education.
Federal University of Minas Gerais (UFMG)

Education Options:
From public universities to private institutions, Minas Gerais offers
diverse educational opportunities. Many universities offer programs in English for international students.
